summary.para: The KERB_TICKET_UNLOCK_LOGON structure contains information to unlock a workstation.

member.name: KERB_TICKET_UNLOCK_LOGON.Logon
member.summary: structure. All members of the structure must be the same as the structure used in the original logon except the member, which must be set to KerbTicketUnlockLogon.

member.name: KERB_TICKET_UNLOCK_LOGON.LogonId
member.summary: structure containing the logon identifier of the current logon session. This ID was previously returned from the initial logon by.
